import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import AWS from'../aws-config';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Projects=_ref=>{let{project}=_ref;const[projectData,setProjectData]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{const dynamoDb=new AWS.DynamoDB.DocumentClient();const params={TableName:'Projects',Key:{ProjectName:project// e.g., "Apollo", "About Nour Website", etc.
}};try{const data=await dynamoDb.get(params).promise();if(data.Item){setProjectData(data.Item);}else{console.error('No data found for the given key.');}}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching project:',error);}};fetchData();},[project]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"project-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:projectData?projectData.Name||projectData.ProjectName:project}),projectData?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[projectData.ProjectOverview&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Project Overview"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:projectData.ProjectOverview})]}),projectData.Architecture&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:projectData.Architecture,alt:"Project Architecture"})}),projectData.TechnicalImplementation&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Technical Implementation"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:projectData.TechnicalImplementation})]}),projectData.Configurations&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Configurations"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:projectData.Configurations})]}),projectData.DataCenterCabling&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Data Center Cabling"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:projectData.DataCenterCabling})]})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No project data found."})]});};export default Projects;
